location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 357: Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Samuel Hennell forwards copies of his letters to His Excellency Lieutenant-Colonel Justin Sheil CB, Her Majesty's Minister at the Court of Persia. The letters (nos. 346, 348, 349, 351, 352, 353) are not included with this letter, but nos. 349, 351 and 352 can be found earlier in the file (see ff.132-133, ff.138-139 and ff.140-145 respectively).
